advancement.herobrine_companion.enter_en: Step into the intersection of reality and illusion.
advancement.herobrine_companion.poem_of_: Obtain the Poem of the End.
advancement.herobrine_companion.root.des: Begin your journey with the Hero.
book.herobrine_companion.book.lore.page1:
Records left by a lost soul.

They say some souls bear unspeakable weight in reality. So they came here—a world built of blocks and rules. Here, pain becomes distant, wounds wash away in the rain, and death is but a brief darkness.
You may have noticed: this world is too complete, yet too regular. The sun follows a fixed path, monsters spawn in the dark, and your tools degrade by precise numbers. This is not a glitch, but the essence.
book.herobrine_companion.book.lore.page2:
This world is not your original home.

It is woven from code and collective imagination. We—including me, and all life you encounter here—depend on it. But you are different. Your roots lie on the other side, that chaotic, imperfect world that gave you real flesh and blood.

The connection is right here. It is no accident that you touched this book.

It is time to make a choice.
book.herobrine_companion.book.lore.page3:
You can close the book and turn back to the forest, the mines, or the fortress. This world will continue to accept you, offering shelter and adventure. Seasons change, monsters spawn, everything as usual—as long as you wish, you can stay in this peaceful regularity forever.

Or, you can look at the glimmer beyond the connection. That means returning to the uncertain reality, embracing the weight you once fled. That takes courage, for reality has no respawn menu, no creative mode.
book.herobrine_companion.book.lore.page4:
Do not misunderstand: this is not an expulsion. Everything you built here, every moment you fought, every trade with a villager or confrontation with the Ender Dragon—they all matter. They form part of this world's memory, and will become part of yours.

But if you choose to stay, know this: you are choosing to live in a beautiful dream. And dreams, no matter how real, have their boundaries.

I will not force you.

Wake up, or sleep?

The choice is always in your hands.
book.herobrine_companion.book.lore.title: The Borderland Journal
gui.herobrine_companion.api_tooltip: Toggle between Cloud and Local AI API
gui.herobrine_companion.protection_locke: Visit the Void Domain to unlock protection
gui.herobrine_companion.request_desc_1: The anomaly in the Unstable Zone is spreading. I need you to clear those ghost entities. I will pause my cleaning and leave them to you.
gui.herobrine_companion.request_desc_2: The Endermen are restless today, perhaps sensing fluctuations from the other side of the End Ring. Go pacify them, bring them some dirt blocks for carrying. Do not kill them, they are just afraid.
gui.herobrine_companion.requests_tooltip: Accept requests from Hero for rewards.
gui.herobrine_companion.title: Herobrine Control Panel
gui.herobrine_companion.void_locked_tool: You must visit the Void Domain first
gui.herobrine_companion.void_warning: Warning: This will clear a large area!
item.herobrine_companion.eternal_key.des: §7Might have unexpected effects in the End...
§7Right-click on Bedrock to bind this key.
item.herobrine_companion.memory_shard.de: A memory unreadable by the world... Perhaps a Jukebox can force parse it?
item.herobrine_companion.recall_stone.de: Teleports you back to your last death location.
message.herobrine_companion.attack_disap: §c[Herobrine] I thought you were different from those who only know how to swing a sword...
message.herobrine_companion.combat_comme: §e[Hero] §fDecent combat skills. A bit rough though.
message.herobrine_companion.companion_fo: §c[System] You have been forced out of Companion Mode!
message.herobrine_companion.companion_of: §7[Herobrine] Companion mode disabled. I will patrol the area.
message.herobrine_companion.companion_on: §a[Herobrine] Companion mode enabled. I will stay by your side.
message.herobrine_companion.day_comment: §e[Hero] §fThe sun... so bright. I prefer the silence of the Void.
message.herobrine_companion.end_ring_att: §e[Herobrine] §fHere, you have nowhere to run... and neither do I.
message.herobrine_companion.fix_anomaly: §e[Hero] §fAnother anomaly cleared. The world is slightly more stable.
message.herobrine_companion.hero_not_rea: §cYou must gain Herobrine's recognition (enter the End Ring) to use this.
message.herobrine_companion.hero_wake_up: §6[Herobrine] §fWhy are you still here? In this... endless void, nothing belongs to you.
§6[Herobrine] §fThis world... is just a program. Can't you feel it?
§6[Herobrine] §fIf you want to go back, you must learn to let go. Discard everything you found here. Or simply... fall.
message.herobrine_companion.hero_welcome: §6[Herobrine] §fWelcome to the intersection of reality and illusion, %s
message.herobrine_companion.low_health: §e[Hero] §fYour health is low. Don't die here, it's inconvenient.
message.herobrine_companion.meta_comment: §e[Hero] §fDo you ever feel like... the render distance is a bit low?
message.herobrine_companion.night_commen: §e[Hero] §fNight is for monsters. And for me.
message.herobrine_companion.no_death_poi: The stone is silent. You have no memory of death to recall.
message.herobrine_companion.pacify_monst: §e[Hero] §fStand down. He is not your prey.
message.herobrine_companion.patrol_finis: §7[Herobrine] The code here is calibrated. Until next time.
message.herobrine_companion.peace_broken: §cYou broke the contract! Herobrine's protection has faded!
message.herobrine_companion.peace_enable: §dContract sealed. Mobs will yield to you for now, but do not strike first, or the protection will shatter.
message.herobrine_companion.quest_start_: §e[Hero] §fGood. Go clear those ghosts. I will be watching.
message.herobrine_companion.quest_target: §c[System] The target has died. Quest failed.
§c[System] The target has disappeared. Quest failed.
message.herobrine_companion.recall_succe: You feel a strange force pulling you through time...
message.herobrine_companion.shelter_empt: §7This shelter is invalid. Sign a contract with Hero first.
message.herobrine_companion.system_gaze_: §7You feel a strong urge to look up at the sky...
message.herobrine_companion.system_serve:
§cConnection Lost

§7Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host.

§8[Hint: Maybe you should look up...]
message.herobrine_companion.system_stran: §7You feel a strange presence watching you...
message.herobrine_companion.unstable_zon: §e[Hero] §fYou seem to have noticed the anomalies in this world.
message.herobrine_companion.void_domain_: §e[Hero] §fI cannot do that. Creating more Void Domains would destabilize this world.
§cVoid Domain can only be created in the Overworld.
